text: blaze meter is all about continuous
performance testing and right now as the
entire software industry undergoes a
transformation and how software is
delivered blaze meter has been able to
work with AWS to embrace both the cloud
and open source as a way to build a
business to provide modern and evolving
tools to our customers the business
value that we deliver is confidence
confidence for the developers that their
code will perform as its intended and
confidence to the end users that they
get the interaction and the experience
that they need and also from a business
standpoint because it delivers
competitive advantage by AWS focusing on
the customer it drives us to focus more
clearly on the customer so we can
architect the solutions that they
require when they are moving their
infrastructure to the cloud the APN
network for blaze meter is very
strategic to our business from a
business development standpoint we get
opportunities to go to market with AWS
and from my perspective from an
awareness standpoint we get reach to the
market that we otherwise would not be
able to attain we live in an API driven
world it's all about integrations and
partnerships services like code pipeline
can lay the foundation for the easy
delivery of high quality high
performance applications without
developers or DevOps teams having to
worry too much about their own tooling
or becoming specialists in vendor based
tools or processes they can simply
utilize code pipeline code deploy and
other AWS services to do the heavy
lifting of that testing and releasing
for them so they can work on feature
code and fixes and making sure that
those innovations are getting out to
their customers as quickly as possible
we're very much a small start-up and
being a part of code pipeline lends us
huge credibility in the marketplace we
provide trust and authenticity in terms
of our technology solutions many times
when we're working
the customers new to blaze meet are just
discovering place meter they'll ask us
do you run on AWS and we always say of
course yes they say oh good let's move
on let's go forward it helps us go to
market in a way that we provide trust
and authenticity in terms of art or
technology solutions so I think it's a
win-win
